ruleBookInfo.intro: var novelIntro=({title,author,genre,score,desc})=>['','âœ§*Ì¥â‚ŠËšâ€§â˜†ï½¥ï¾Ÿ'.repeat(3),`ğŸ“–ä¹¦åï¼šã€Š${title}ã€‹`,`ğŸ‘¤ä½œè€…ï¼š${author}`,`ğŸ·ï¸ç±»å‹ï¼š${genre}`,`âœ¨æœ€æ–°ç« èŠ‚ï¼š${latestChapterTitle}`,'âœ¦ â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€ âœ¦',`${desc}`,'âˆ'.padEnd(20,'ï½*')].join('\n').replace(/^/gm,'ã€€ã€€'); var latestChapterTitle=`{{@@.my-unit-md@span@text}}` var intro=`{{@@.text-medium@text##æœ€è¿‘ç« ç¯€}}` novelIntro({ "title": book.name, "author": book.author, "genre": book.kind, "latestChapterTitle":latestChapterTitle, "desc": intro }) ##(^|[ã€‚ï¼ï¼Ÿ]+[â€ã€ï¼‰ã€‘]?)##$1

ruleContent.content: var data=JSON.parse(result) var imageList=data.data.info.images.images var imgTags = imageList.map(item => ``).join('\n'); imgTags;

ruleToc.chapterUrl:
<js>
var mid=java.get("mid")
var id=`{{$..id}}`
var r=`https://api-get-v2.mgsearcher.com/api/chapter/getinfo?m=${mid}&c=${id}`

</js>
